settings.title: How does the AirTag feature work in the wallet?
settings.content: The wallet has a dedicated pocket designed to snugly hold your Apple AirTag, ensuring it stays in place and provides excellent signal strength for tracking.

settings.title: Can I use the Anti-Theft RFID Leather Wallet for AirTag with both credit cards and cash?
settings.content: Yes, the wallet has space for credit cards and a money clip for holding cash, making it a versatile accessory.

settings.title: Is the Women's Large Foldable Travel Duffle bag waterproof?
settings.content: Yes, the Women's Large Foldable Travel Duffle is made from waterproof material, making it suitable for various weather conditions.

settings.title: How many compartments does the Men's Foldable Waterproof Business Backpack have?
settings.content: The backpack includes a computer pocket, ID bag, mobile phone bag, sandwich zipper bag, and a zipper pocket for organized storage.

settings.title: Can the Shell Shape PU Leather Makeup Bag be used for items other than cosmetics?
settings.content: Yes, the makeup bag is versatile and can be used for various items like toiletries, small accessories, or as a travel pouch.

settings.title: How can I track my order on Miami Trip Bags?
settings.content: After placing an order, you will receive a confirmation email with a tracking number. Use this number on our website's "Order Tracking" page to monitor your shipment.

settings.title: What payment methods are accepted on Miami Trip Bags?
settings.content: We accept various payment methods including credit/debit cards, PayPal, VISA, Master Cards, AMEX & Discover.

settings.title: How do I contact customer service for assistance?
settings.content: You can reach our customer service team through the "Contact Us" page on our website, where you'll find our email address and phone number.
